description.narrative: The aimed study will map the livestock dairy sector (milk & meat) in Bangladesh, its key actors and linkages, trends, issues, challenges and (business) opportunities. The outcome will:(i) provide to-the-point details for Dutch companies and institutes active in the dairy value chain to elevate the dairy sector of Bangladesh through investments and/or knowledge and technology, and(ii) provide further insight and pave ways for interventions to relevant supervisory, facilitating and regulatory bodies and key chain actors in Bangladesh.With the overall purpose to realise growth and development in the dairy sector of Bangladesh in a sustainable and responsible manner. The aimed study will map the livestock dairy sector (milk & meat) in Bangladesh, its key actors and linkages, trends, issues, challenges and (business) opportunities. The outcome will:(iii) provide to-the-point details for Dutch companies and institutes active in the dairy value chain to elevate the dairy sector of Bangladesh through investments and/or knowledge and technology, and(iv) provide further insight and pave ways for interventions to relevant supervisory, facilitating and regulatory bodies and key chain actors in Bangladesh.With the overall purpose to realise growth and development in the dairy sector of Bangladesh in a sustainable and responsible manner.
